exm.mng: to harvest, to reap, to gain, crop, harvest, profit, gain, bonus, reward
The sooner you set to work, the sooner you'll reap the rewards. (idiom)
exm.pyn: zǎo dòng shǒu , zǎo shōu huò

exm.mng: you get what you put in, you reap what you sow
exm.pyn: yī fēn gēng yún , yī fēn shōu huò

exm.mng: The sooner you set to work, the sooner you'll reap the rewards. (idiom)
exm.pyn: zǎo dòng shǒu , zǎo shōu huò
